gram_ast.dateliteral

gram.js API

Globals / gram-ast / DateLiteral

Interface: DateLiteral

Represents an ISO8601 calendar date, like 2020-02-02.

see Wikipedia ISO8601 Caelndar dates

Hierarchy

About gram.js

Gram is a textual format for data graphs.
